name: Dragon Mastery Slate
description: Struck to recognize your achievement in reaching the rank of 22 - Dragon.

languages.description: Geschaffen, um dein Erreichen von Rang 22 - Drache zu ehren.
languages.name: Meisterschaft-Insignie: Drache

languages.description: Gravée pour commémorer votre réussite en atteignant le Palier 22 - Dragon.
languages.name: Ardoise de Maîtrise - Dragon

languages.description: Coniata per riconoscere il tuo successo nel raggiungere il grado 22 - Drago.
languages.name: Targa Maestria - Drago

languages.description: 랭크 22 - 드래곤에 도달한 업적을 기리기 위한 표창패입니다.
languages.name: 드래곤 마스터리 슬레이트

languages.description: Impresionado por reconocer tu logro al alcanzar el rango 22 - Dragón.
languages.name: Placa de Maestría de Dragón

languages.description: 为表彰你成功达到段位 22－天龙所打造的物品。
languages.name: 天龙精通石板

languages.description: ドラゴン「マスタリーランク22」へ到達したテンノの成果を示す表彰楯。
languages.name: ドラゴン マスタリー 表彰楯

languages.description: Stworzona, by upamiętnić Twój wyczyn w osiągnięciu rangi 22 - Smok.
languages.name: Tablica Mistrzostwa Smok

languages.description: Concedida em reconhecimento à sua conquista por alcançar o nível 22 - Dragão.
languages.name: Ardósia de Maestria: Dragão

languages.description: 篆刻來認可你達成精通段位 22－天龍的成就。
languages.name: 天龍精段匾

languages.description: ประทับตรารับรู้ถึงความสำเร็จของคุณในการไปถึงอันดับ 22 - มังกร
languages.name: กระดานชนวนความเชี่ยวชาญ: มังกร

languages.description: Seviye 22 - Dragon seviyesine ulaşma başarını anmak için oluşturulmuştur.
languages.name: Dragon Ustalık Plaketi
